dmca.title: [TP-C771877H] Copyright complaint against www.escortguide.cc
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Posted At: Sunday, September 10, 2006 9:19 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [TP-C771877H] Copyright complaint against www.escortguide.cc
Subject: [TP-C771877H] Copyright complaint against www.escortguide.cc


From: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: [TP-C771877H] Copyright complaint against www.escortguide.cc
Reference: [TP-C771877H]

For your review. 

Thank you, 

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc. 
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

==== Original Message ====

Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="0-341435007-1157915606=:67107"

nor denied by domain of yahoo.com) client-ip=66.163.179.170;

X-OriginalArrivalTime: 10 Sep 2006 19:13:32.0686 (UTC) FILETIME=[34FC02E0:01C6D50D] 

 (multipart/mixed)
 (multipart/alternative)
MIME element (text/plain)
 Hello,  
    
This is to inform you that the website www.escortguide.cc hosted by you (74.52.0.0 -
74.52.255.255 - ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110 Dallas, TX US). The IP assigned by you is IP 74.52.110.2.  They are using
a stolen layout, content and data base. You should know that we already opened an
copyright incident ticket at GoDaddy.com where they registered this domain name one
month ago. They are using our website trying to steal from our customers pretending
that we changed tyhe extension from .tv to .cc. Some of our customers has already
paid important amount of money to these thieves. 
  You should also know that part of these thieves team is a well known romanian
hacker called Mateias Calin aka "Metal" aka "Dr.Mengele", who stole over $10
milion from INGRAM MICRO INC. 
  Our copyrighted work is attached to this mail (the site content) so you can veryfy
with google.com cache that www.esccortguide.tv was identicaly presented as
www.escortguide.cc .  
My address ( Drumul Timonierului 14, bl.113C, sc.A, ap.57, sector 6, Bucuresti)
could be clearly seen on my ID attached to this mail.   
The domain name www.escortguide.cc is registered with GoDaddy.com on August 8th 2006.  
The domain name www.escortguide.tv is registered by me with Register.com on December
11th 2005.  
Me, the complaining party, I have never authorise anybody to use the content of my
site in any manner.  
I also state that the information provided in this notification is accurate and
under penalty of perjury, that me Sabin Martie I am the owner of the copyrighted
website www.escortguide.tv .  
I have attach here a copy of my copyright certificate in PDF format along with my
romanian ID. 
  We are looking only for justice, nothing more! Please do something against this
bunch of thieves!! 
  Waiting your response ASAP. 
      
Sincerely yours,  
    
Sabin Martie
